org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.list
Class AeMessageReceiverFilterManager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.list.AeMessageReceiverFilterManager
public class AeMessageReceiverFilterManager
extends java.lang.Object

Provides filtering capability for the in-memory queue manager queued receivers listing.

filter

public static AeMessageReceiverListResult filter(AeMessageReceiverFilter aFilter,
                                                 java.util.Collection aMessageReceivers)
Returns a filtered list of message receivers.

Parameters:
aFilter - Determines the selection criteria.
aMessageReceivers - All of the available receivers on the queue.
Returns:
The filtered results.
